intro: Psychotria calviflora, commonly known as the white psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, white or pale yellow flowers that are clustered in dense inflorescences. Its leaves are typically elliptical and have a smooth, glossy surface. Psychotria calviflora is often found in moist, shaded habitats such as forests and undergrowth areas.
